defined_text = {
	name = GetExarchLand
	random = no
	
	# Code generated by exarchs/exarch_formation_decisions.py

		localisation_key = to_exarch_land_EEA_tt
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = EEA } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_exarch_land_EEB_tt
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = EEB } }

defined_text = {
	name = EnablesParliament
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = mechanic_has_parliament_yes
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_dlc = "Common Sense"
				has_dlc = "Domination"
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = OpenClosePotentialProjectsText
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_open_potential_projects_menu_tt
		trigger = {
			has_province_flag = to_hide_potential_projects_gui
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_close_potential_projects_menu_tt
	}
}

}

defined_text = {
	name = GetDevelopedSilkProvinces
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_6_more_such_provinces_tt
		trigger = {
			num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_subjects_with = {
				value = 7
				development = 20
				trade_goods = elysian_silk
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_6_such_provinces_tt
		trigger = {
			num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_subjects_with = {
				value = 6
				development = 20
				trade_goods = elysian_silk
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_5_such_provinces_tt
		trigger = {
			num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_subjects_with = {
				value = 5
				development = 20
				trade_goods = elysian_silk
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_4_such_provinces_tt
		trigger = {
			num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_subjects_with = {
				value = 4
				development = 20
				trade_goods = elysian_silk
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_3_such_provinces_tt
		trigger = {
			num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_subjects_with = {
				value = 3
				development = 20
				trade_goods = elysian_silk
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_2_such_provinces_tt
		trigger = {
			num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_subjects_with = {
				value = 2
				development = 20
				trade_goods = elysian_silk
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_1_such_provinces_tt
		trigger = {
			num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_subjects_with = {
				value = 1
				development = 20
				trade_goods = elysian_silk
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_0_such_provinces_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetElysianSilkProvinceTooltip
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_elysian_silk_provinces_tooltip_starting
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = to_elysian_silk_price_increase_1_done }
		}
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = to_elysian_silk_price_increase_5_done }
		}
		localisation_key = to_elysian_silk_provinces_tooltip_additional
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_elysian_silk_provinces_tooltip_final
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetPotentialElysianSilkProvinces
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_elysian_silk_base_provinces_tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = to_elysian_silk_price_increase_5_done }
				NOT = { total_own_and_non_tributary_subject_development = 1000 }
			}
		}
	}
	# Code generated by elysian silk/potential_provinces.py
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_elysian_silk_potential_27_tt

			total_own_and_non_tributary_subject_development = 21000

	text = {

defined_text = {
	name = GetStandardizeCurrencyGold
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
		trigger = {
			mission_completed = to_standardize_currency_mission
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			any_owned_province = {
				to_ely_high_income_mission_is_gold_province = yes
				NOT = { trade_goods = gold }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_x_icon_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetSenatorMP
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_senator_cl
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				culture_group = byzantine
				nhs_check_all_elysian_tags = { CONDITION = tag }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_mp_cl
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					culture_group = byzantine
					nhs_check_all_elysian_tags = { CONDITION = tag }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

defined_text = {

	random = no

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ctm_council_choose_adm
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ctm_council_choose_dip
		}

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ctm_council_choose_mil
		}
	}

defined_text = {
    name = GetNumberOfHeralds
	random = no
    text = {
        localisation_key = nhs_too_many_herads_recently0_tt
        trigger = {
			has_estate_influence_modifier = {
				estate = estate_church
				modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY
			}
			has_estate_influence_modifier = {
				estate = estate_church
				modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_2
			}
			has_estate_influence_modifier = {
				estate = estate_church
				modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_3
			}
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = nhs_too_many_herads_recently1_tt
        trigger = {
			calc_true_if = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY
				}
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_2
				}
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_3
				}
				amount = 2
			}
        }
    }
	text = {
        localisation_key = nhs_too_many_herads_recently2_tt
        trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY
				}
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_2
				}
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_3
				}
			}
        }
	}
	text = {
        localisation_key = nhs_too_many_herads_recently3_tt
        trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_3
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_2
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY
				}
			}
        }
	}
}

defined_text = {
    name = GetNumberOfHeralds_for_interaction
	random = no
    text = {
        localisation_key = nothing_tt
        trigger = {
			has_estate_influence_modifier = {
				estate = estate_church
				modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY
			}
			has_estate_influence_modifier = {
				estate = estate_church
				modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_2
			}
			has_estate_influence_modifier = {
				estate = estate_church
				modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_3
			}
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = nhs_too_many_herads_recently1_tt
        trigger = {
			calc_true_if = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY
				}
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_2
				}
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_3
				}
				amount = 2
			}
        }
    }
	text = {
        localisation_key = nhs_too_many_herads_recently2_tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY
				}
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_2
				}
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_3
				}
			}
        }
	}
	text = {
        localisation_key = nhs_too_many_herads_recently3_tt
        trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_3
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY_2
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_estate_influence_modifier = {
					estate = estate_church
					modifier = NHS_HERALD_ACTIVE_MISSIONARY
				}
			}
        }
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = GetRestriction
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_GetRestriction_SHQ
		trigger = {
			tag = SHQ
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_GetRestriction_CTM_KYK
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = CM1
				tag = KYK
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_GetRestriction_VIN
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = MK1
				tag = HLL
				tag = VIN
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_GetRestriction_MSN
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = MSG
				tag = MSN
			}
		}
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetRestrictionDesc
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_GetRestrictionDesc_SHQ
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = SHQ
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_GetRestrictionDesc_CTM_KYK
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					tag = CM1
					tag = KYK
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_GetRestrictionDesc_VIN
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					tag = MK1
					tag = HLL
					tag = VIN
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_GetRestrictionDesc_MSN
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					tag = MSG
					tag = MSN
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = nhs_GetCoalEnlightenmentOwn
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			enlightenment = 100
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_x_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = { enlightenment = 100 }
		}
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = nhs_GetCoalEnlightenmentOwner
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			owner = { has_institution = enlightenment }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_x_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = { owner = { has_institution = enlightenment } }
		}
	}
}

	name = nhs_GetCoalTriggersDevelopment
	random = no

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				development = 20

					full_idea_group = innovativeness_ideas
				}
			}
		}

					owner = {
						full_idea_group = innovativeness_ideas
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	name = GetAssimilationElysianCultureName

		localisation_key = to_owner_culture_tt
		trigger = {
			owner = {
				NOT = { nhs_post_fragmentation_culturally_elysian = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = shqipproi
		trigger = {
			owner = {
				primary_culture = shqipproi
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = borealian
		trigger = {
			owner = {
				has_country_flag = nhs_borealians_appeared_country
			}
			nhs_borealian_province = yes
		}
	}
	text = {

			owner = {

			}

		}

			}
			nhs_kykladian_province = yes
		}
	}
	text = {

		trigger = {
			owner = {

			}
			nhs_elyric_province = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = arkadian
		trigger = {
			owner = {
				has_country_flag = nhs_arkadians_appeared_country
			}
			nhs_arkadian_province = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = eleutheroi
		trigger = {
			owner = {
				has_country_flag = nhs_eleutheroi_appeared_country
			}
			nhs_eleutheroi_province = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = romaic
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				region = northeast_america_region
				region = southeast_america_region
			}
			to_nhs_eligible_for_romaic_culture = yes
		}
	}
	text = {

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				region = northeast_america_region
				region = southeast_america_region
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_owner_culture_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetCurrentHellenicAttitude
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_friendly_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_friendly = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = HellenicUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_neutral_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_neutral = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = HellenicUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_unfriendly_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_unfriendly = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = HellenicUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_hostile_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_hostile = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = HellenicUprising
			}
		}
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetOrthodoxAttitudeChangeMinor
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_change_neutral_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_changes_minor_neutral = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = OrthodoxUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_change_unfriendly_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_changes_minor_unfriendly = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = OrthodoxUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_change_hostile_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_changes_minor_hostile = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = OrthodoxUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_orthodox_attitude_nochange_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetOrthodoxAttitudeChangeMajor
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_change_neutral_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_changes_major_neutral = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = OrthodoxUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_change_unfriendly_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_changes_major_unfriendly = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = OrthodoxUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_attitude_change_hostile_tt
		trigger = {
			to_nhs_hellenic_disaster_attitude_changes_major_hostile = {
				ATTITUDE_VARIABLE = OrthodoxUprising
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_nhs_orthodox_attitude_nochange_tt
	}
}

	name = GetOrthodoxAttitudeChangeHuge

	text = {

defined_text = {
	name = GetPotentialProvinces
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_exarch_potential_provinces_konstantinia_balkans_anatolia
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = ELG
			}
			has_global_flag = nhs_elg_got_balkans
			has_global_flag = nhs_elg_got_anatolia
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_exarch_potential_provinces_konstantinia_balkans
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = ELG
			}
			has_global_flag = nhs_elg_got_balkans
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_exarch_potential_provinces_konstantinia_anatolia
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = ELG
			}
			has_global_flag = nhs_elg_got_anatolia
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_exarch_potential_provinces_konstantinia
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = ELG
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_exarch_potential_provinces_capital_region
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetExistingElysiaName
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = ELR
		trigger = {
			exists = ELR
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = ERR
		trigger = {
			exists = ERR
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = ER1
		trigger = {
			exists = ER1
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = ELY
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				exists = ELY
				AND = {
					NOT = { exists = NHS }
					has_global_flag = nhs_romaic_to_elysian
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = NHS
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetExistingElysiaReligion
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = ELR_religion_tt
		trigger = {
			exists = ELR
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = ERR_religion_tt
		trigger = {
			exists = ERR
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = ERF_religion_tt
		trigger = {
			exists = ER1
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = ELY_religion_tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				exists = ELY
				AND = {
					NOT = { exists = NHS }
					has_global_flag = nhs_romaic_to_elysian
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = NHS_religion_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetExistingElysiaReligionIfExists
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_elysia_religion_tt
		trigger = {
			nhs_check_all_elysian_tags = { CONDITION = exists }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

			num_of_cities = 15
		}

	}

			dip = 5
		}

	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetHasFriendlyNative
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			any_known_country = {
				technology_group = north_american
				has_opinion = { who = ROOT value = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_x_icon_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetElysianCapitalMonumentGovernmentModifier
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_capital_monument_monarchy_leviathan_tt
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
			has_dlc = "Leviathan"
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_capital_monument_monarchy_tt
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_capital_monument_theocracy_tt
		trigger = {
			government = theocracy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_capital_monument_republic_tt
		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
}

		}

		}
	}

		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetVarangianStrongholdTooltip
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_add_and_modify_varangian_stronghold_tt
		trigger = {
			VGD = {
				num_of_cities = 2
			}
			any_owned_province = {
				has_province_modifier = to_varangian_stronghold_independent
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_add_varangian_stronghold_tt
		trigger = {
			VGD = {
				num_of_cities = 2
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_modify_varangian_stronghold_tt
		trigger = {
			any_owned_province = {
				has_province_modifier = to_varangian_stronghold_independent
			}
		}

	}

defined_text = {
	name = GetMajorChurchTemple
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_church_of_saint_konstantinos_tt
		trigger = {
			religion_group = christian
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_grand_temple_of_ares_tt
		trigger = {
			religion = pantheon_worship
			953 = {
				owned_by = ROOT
				has_province_modifier = nhs_ares_temple_tm
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_grand_temple_of_poseidon_tt
		trigger = {
			religion = pantheon_worship
			953 = {
				owned_by = ROOT
				has_province_modifier = nhs_poseidon_temple_tm
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_temple_of_apollo_tt
		trigger = {
			religion = pantheon_worship
			to_hellenic_apollo_pantheon = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_temple_of_poseidon_tt
		trigger = {
			religion = pantheon_worship
			to_hellenic_poseidon_pantheon = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_temple_of_zeus_tt
		trigger = {
			religion = pantheon_worship
		}
	}
	
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_grand_temple_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetMonarchAsKingsOfKings
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_monarch_as_king_of_kings_tt
		trigger = {
			has_regency = no
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_heir_as_king_of_kings_tt
		trigger = {
			has_regency = yes
			has_female_heir = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_monarch_as_paramount_sovereign_tt
		trigger = {
			has_regency = no
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_heir_as_paramount_sovereign_tt
		trigger = {
			has_regency = yes
			has_female_heir = yes
		}
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetInvasionBeginsDescription
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_invasion_begins_elysian_tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = ELY
				tag = ER1
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_invasion_begins_roman_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetImperialProtectorateDesc
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_imperial_protectorate_desc
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetFinalRedMissionTitle
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_elysia_ascendant_mission_title
		trigger = {
			has_mission = to_elysia_ascendant_mission
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_rome_restored_mission_title
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetMonthlyJanissaryChange
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_janissary_regiments_change_tooltip
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_monthly_janissary_regiment_negative_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = to_janissary_regiments_change_tooltip
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_monthly_janissary_regiment_positive_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryChangeActiveRegiments
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_janissary_change_active_regiments_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = to_num_of_janissaries
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_minus_zero_tt
	}
}

### Child Levy
defined_text = {
	name = GetChildLevyStatus
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
		}
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_on_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_off_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryChangeChildLevy
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_change_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_janissary_regiments_child_levy
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_change_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetChildLevyReserve
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
			to_has_abrahamic_religion = yes
		}
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_reserve_tt
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
		}
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_reserve_heretic_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryChildLevy
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_consider_revoke_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
			has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_child_levy
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_consider_enact_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_child_levy
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringChildLevy
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_child_levy
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringRevokeChildLevy
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_child_levy
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ChildLevyPotentialGainLoss
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_child_levy_potential
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_pontential_loss_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_pontential_gain_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetChildLevyEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_effect_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetChildLevyEffectRemoved
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_effect_heretic_removed_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetChildLevyHereticEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_effect_heretic_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = { to_has_abrahamic_religion = yes }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetChildLevyHereticEffectRemoved
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_child_levy_effect_heretic_removed_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = { to_has_abrahamic_religion = yes }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

### Draft the Faithful
defined_text = {
	name = GetFromTrueFaithStatus
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_on_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_off_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryChangeFromTrueFaith
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_change_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_janissary_regiments_from_true_faith
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_change_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetFromTrueFaithReserve
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
			to_has_abrahamic_religion = yes
			has_country_flag = nhs_barbaroi_integration
		}
		localisation_key = to_true_faith_reserve_symmachoi_heretic_tt
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
			has_country_flag = nhs_barbaroi_integration
		}
		localisation_key = to_true_faith_reserve_symmachoi_tt
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
			to_has_abrahamic_religion = yes
		}
		localisation_key = to_true_faith_reserve_heretic_tt
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
		localisation_key = to_true_faith_reserve_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryFromFaithful
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_consider_revoke_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_from_true_faith
				has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_child_levy
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_consider_enact_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_from_true_faith
			OR = {
				has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
				has_country_flag = to_consider_child_levy
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_child_levy }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringFromTrueFaith
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_from_true_faith
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringRevokeFromTrueFaith
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_from_true_faith
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = FromTrueFaithPotentialGainLoss
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_child_levy_potential
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_pontential_loss_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_pontential_gain_tt
	}
}

	name = GetFromTrueFaithEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_effect_tt
	}
}

	name = GetFromTrueFaithEffectRemoved

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_removed_effect_tt
	}
}

	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = nhs_barbaroi_integration
		}
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_effect_symmachoi_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

	name = GetFromTrueFaithEffectRemovedSymmachoi
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = nhs_barbaroi_integration
		}
		localisation_key = to_from_true_faith_removed_effect_symmachoi_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

	name = GetTrueFaithReligion
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			to_has_abrahamic_religion = yes
		}
		localisation_key = to_root_religion_group_tt
	}

		localisation_key = to_root_religion_tt
	}
}

### Recruitment Quotas
defined_text = {
	name = GetRecruitmentQuotasStatus
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_recruitment_quotas
		}
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_on_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_off_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryChangeRecruitmentQuotas
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = to_janissary_recruitment_quotas }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_change_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_janissary_regiments_recruitment_quotas
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_change_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetRecruitmentQuotasReserve
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_recruitment_quotas
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_reserve_with_from_true_faith_tt
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_recruitment_quotas
		}
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_reserve_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryRecruitmentQuotas
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_consider_revoke_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_recruitment_quotas
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_recruitment_quotas
				has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_child_levy
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_recruitment_quotas
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_consider_enact_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_recruitment_quotas
			OR = {
				has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
				has_country_flag = to_consider_child_levy
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_child_levy }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringRecruitmentQuotas
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_recruitment_quotas
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringRevokeRecruitmentQuotas
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_recruitment_quotas
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = RecruitmentQuotasPotentialGainLoss
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_child_levy_potential
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_pontential_with_from_true_faith_loss_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_recruitment_quotas
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = to_consider_from_true_faith
				has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_pontential_loss_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_recruitment_quotas
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_pontential_with_from_true_faith_gain_tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = to_consider_from_true_faith
				has_country_modifier = to_janissary_child_levy
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_pontential_gain_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetRecruitmentQuotasEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_effect_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetRecruitmentQuotasEffectRemoved
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_recruitment_quotas_removed_effect_tt
	}
}

### Open Recruitment
defined_text = {
	name = GetOpenRecruitmentStatus
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_open_recruitment
		}
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_on_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_off_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryChangeOpenRecruitment
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = to_janissary_open_recruitment }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_change_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_janissary_regiments_open_recruitment
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_change_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetOpenRecruitmentReserve
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_increase_compensation
		}
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_reserve_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryOpenRecruitment
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_consider_revoke_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_open_recruitment
			has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_open_recruitment
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_open_recruitment
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_consider_enact_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_open_recruitment
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringOpenRecruitment
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_open_recruitment
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringRevokeOpenRecruitment
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_open_recruitment
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = OpenRecruitmentPotentialGainLoss
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_open_recruitment_potential
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_pontential_loss_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_pontential_gain_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetOpenRecruitmentEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_effect_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetOpenRecruitmentEffectRemoved
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_open_recruitment_removed_effect_tt
	}
}

### Increase Compensation
defined_text = {
	name = GetIncreaseCompensationStatus
	random = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_increase_compensation
		}
		localisation_key = to_increase_compensation_on_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_increase_compensation_off_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetIncreaseCompensationEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_increase_compensation_effect_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetIncreaseCompensationEffectRemoved
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_increase_compensation_removed_effect_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryIncreaseCompensation
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_consider_revoke_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_increase_compensation
			has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_increase_compensation
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_has_janissary_law_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissary_increase_compensation
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_consider_enact_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_increase_compensation
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_not_has_janissary_law_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringIncreaseCompensation
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_increase_compensation
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ConsideringRevokeIncreaseCompensation
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_y_icon_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = to_consider_revoke_increase_compensation
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

###Blood Tax
defined_text = {
	name = GetBloodTaxEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_demand_blood_tax_effect_both_true_faith_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
			if = {
				limit = {
					to_has_abrahamic_religion = yes
				}
				FROM = { religion_group = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				FROM = { religion = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_demand_blood_tax_effect_true_faith_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_demand_blood_tax_effect_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetBloodTaxRemovedEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_demand_blood_tax_removed_effect_both_true_faith_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
			if = {
				limit = {
					to_has_abrahamic_religion = yes
				}
				FROM = { religion_group = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				FROM = { religion = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_demand_blood_tax_removed_effect_true_faith_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_demand_blood_tax_removed_effect_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetBloodTaxSymmachoiEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_demand_blood_tax_effect_symmachoi_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = nhs_barbaroi_integration
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetBloodTaxSymmachoiRemovedEffect
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_demand_blood_tax_removed_effect_symmachoi_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = nhs_barbaroi_integration
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = BloodTaxPotentialGainLoss
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
			FROM = {
				is_variable_equal = {
					which = to_blood_tax_from_true_faith_potential
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_blood_tax_from_true_faith_pontential_loss_tt
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = to_blood_tax
					has_country_modifier = to_blood_tax_true_faith
				}
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_modifier = to_janissaries_from_true_faith
		}
		localisation_key = to_blood_tax_from_true_faith_pontential_gain_tt
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_variable_equal = {
					which = to_blood_tax_potential
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_blood_tax_pontential_loss_tt
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = to_blood_tax
					has_country_modifier = to_blood_tax_true_faith
				}
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_blood_tax_pontential_gain_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetJanissaryChangeBloodTax
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_empty_string_tt
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				any_subject_country = {
					OR = {
						has_country_modifier = to_blood_tax
						has_country_modifier = to_blood_tax_true_faith
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_blood_tax_change_zero_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_janissary_regiments_blood_tax
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = to_blood_tax_change_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TradeExpeditionDuration
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_minus_tt
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = to_send_trade_expedition }
					had_country_flag = { flag = to_send_trade_expedition days = 7300 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Code generated by trade expeditions/trade_expeditions.py
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_1_months_tt
		trigger = {
			FROM = { had_country_flag = { flag = to_send_trade_expedition days = 7270 } }
		}
	}
	text = {

		}

		}
	}

		trigger = {
			FROM = { had_country_flag = { flag = to_send_trade_expedition days = 7148 } }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_6_months_tt
		trigger = {

		}

defined_text = {
	name = TotalTradeShareKykladia
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_yellow_zero_percentage_tt
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = {
				which = to_kykladia_trade_share_total
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = to_total_trade_share_in_kykladian_isles_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = BurnVeniceText
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs2_mainlandevents.42.ca
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nhs_new_flight_taken_venetians }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs2_mainlandevents.42.cb
	}
}

	name = GetHomelandsBuildingCount
	text = {
		localisation_key = ZERO
		trigger = {
			is_variable_equal = { which = nhs_HomelandsBuildingCount value = 0 }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = nhs_HomelandsBuildingCount_tt
	}
}

			is_variable_equal = { which = to_ElysiumBuildingCount value = 0 }
		}
	}

		localisation_key = to_ElysiumBuildingCount_tt
	}
